00027 int spot_image_tiff_read(double **img, int *nx, int *ny, char *filename, 
00028                          double scale, double offset) {
00029 
00030   size_t npixels;
00031   uint32 *raster;
00032   //uint16* orientation;
00033   int i, j;
00034   TIFF* tif;
00035   int fail = 0;
00036 
00037   // Open file and get fields.
00038   tif = TIFFOpen(filename, "r");
00039   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tif);
00040   TIFFGetField(tif, TIFFTAG_IMAGEWIDTH, nx);
00041   TIFFGetField(tif, TIFFTAG_IMAGELENGTH, ny);
00042   //TIFFGetField(tif, TIFFTAG_ORIENTATION, &orientation);
00043 
00044   // Allocate space for image.
00045   npixels = (*nx) * (*ny);
00046   raster = (uint32*) _TIFFmalloc(npixels * sizeof (uint32));
00047   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(raster);
00048   *img = (double*)malloc(npixels * sizeof(double));
00049   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(img);
00050 
00051   // Read image.
00052   if (TIFFReadRGBAImage(tif, *nx, *ny, raster, 0)) {    
00053     for (j=0; j<*ny; j++) {
00054       for (i=0; i<*nx; i++) {
00055         (*img)[j*(*nx) + i] = (TIFFGetR(raster[j*(*nx) + i]) - offset) * scale;
00056       }
00057     }
00058     fail = 0;
00059   }
00060   else {
00061     fail = 1;
00062   }
00063 
00064   // Free temporary memory and close file.
00065   _TIFFfree(raster);
00066   TIFFClose(tif);
00067 
00068   return fail;
00069   
00070 }

00087 int spot_image_tiff_write(double *img, int nx, int ny, char *filename, 
00088                           double scale, double offset) {
00089 
00090   size_t npixels;
00091   uint32 *raster;
00092   int i, j;
00093   TIFF* tif;
00094   int fail = 0;
00095   uint8 pix;
00096   
00097   // Construct raster data to write to file.
00098   npixels = nx * ny;
00099   raster = (uint32*) _TIFFmalloc(npixels * sizeof (uint32));
00100   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(raster);
00101   for (j=0; j<ny; j++) {
00102       for (i=0; i<nx; i++) {
00103         pix = (uint8)((img[j*nx + i] - offset) * scale);
00104         raster[j*nx + i] = 255 << 24 | pix << 16 | pix << 8 | pix; 
00105       }
00106     }
00107 
00108   // Open file and set fields.
00109   tif = TIFFOpen(filename, "w");
00110   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_IMAGEWIDTH, nx);
00111   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_IMAGELENGTH, ny);
00112   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_BITSPERSAMPLE, 8);
00113   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_SAMPLESPERPIXEL, 4);
00114   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_COMPRESSION, COMPRESSION_LZW); // LZW is lossless
00115   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_PLANARCONFIG, PLANARCONFIG_CONTIG);
00116   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_PHOTOMETRIC, PHOTOMETRIC_RGB);
00117   TIFFSetField(tif, TIFFTAG_ORIENTATION, ORIENTATION_BOTLEFT); // alternative TOPLEFT
00118 
00119   // Write file.
00120   if(TIFFWriteEncodedStrip(tif, 0, raster, npixels*4))
00121     fail = 0;
00122   else
00123     fail = 1;
00124 
00125   // Free temporary memory and close file.
00126   _TIFFfree(raster);
00127   TIFFClose(tif);
00128   
00129   return fail;
00130 
00131 }
